mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cafehi_member(member_seq, member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_contact, member_email, member_road_address, member_jibun_address, member_detail_address) VALUES((select nvl(max(member_seq), 0)+1 from cafehi_member), #{member_id}, #{member_pw},#{member_name},#{member_contact}, #{member_email}, #{member_road_address},#{member_jibun_address},#{member_detail_address})
mapper.select: SELECT member_seq, mem.member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_contact, member_email, member_road_address, member_jibun_address, member_detail_address, enabled, auth FROM cafehi_member mem LEFT OUTER JOIN cafehi_member_auth auth on mem.member_id = auth.member_id WHERE mem.member_id = #{member_id}
SELECT count(*) FROM cafehi_member WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
SELECT count(*) FROM cafehi_member WHERE member_email = #{member_email}
mapper.update: UPDATE cafehi_member SET member_pw = #{member_pw} WHERE member_email = #{member_email}
